q1: How many goals in average does your team make per game?
a2: My team average 1 goal a game and they are rubbish.
a3: No, I'm nowhere near athletic enough.
q4: I don't even think I would make it in the World Cup
a4: You could try local football at least
q5: Do you have to pay to play in a local league?
a5: Most grass route player pay subs which helps cover the cost of the pitch rental, kits, balls and the ref on a match day. The cost is usually £3-5 but can vary between areas and teams.
